sentences.english: How much do those brown shoes cost?

sentences.finnish: luen -> Lue sivu 35! -> Älä lue ruokapöydässä.
sentences.english: I read -> Read page 35! -> Don't read at the dining table.

sentences.finnish: syön -> Syö hitaasti! -> Älä syö sokeria!
sentences.english: I eat -> Eat slowly! -> Don't eat sugar!

sentences.finnish: tulen -> Tule kotiin! -> Älä tule viela!
sentences.english: I come -> Come home! -> Don't come yet!

sentences.finnish: avaan -> Avaa ovi! -> Älä avaa tietokonetta!
sentences.english: I open -> Open the door! -> Don't open the computer!

sentences.finnish: valitsen -> Valitse väri! -> Älä valitse vihreä!
sentences.english: I choose -> Choose a color! -> Don't choose green!
